description: Full-Stack Engineer with 6+ years of experience building web and mobile applications, specialized in React.js, Node.js, and React Native. I have led the development of marketplaces, B2C platforms, and eâ€‘commerce solutions, consistently improving performance, scalability, and user experience.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description: Full-stack developer after Yummy Rides acquired ForTodos LLC. Focused on scaling the marketplace, performance, and reliability. Worked on the Yummy Marketplace, Yummy Rides, and Yummy Payments.
achievements: Led the integration of Yummy Marketplace into the Yummy Rides Android app, bridging native Android and React Native to deliver a seamless user experience and ensure stable, production-ready builds.
Modernized the multimedia and app infrastructure, resolving performance bottlenecks, improving navigation flows, and enhancing overall reliability across devices.
Designed and implemented secure end-to-end payment and payout flows on both mobile and backend, including verification, refunds, and disbursement management, strengthening trust and scalability.

Improved platform security and user experience by standardizing APIs, adding robust validations and monitoring, and refining payment interactions such as exchange rates, notifications, and error handling.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description: ForTodos is a mobile application designed to facilitate the buying and selling of used items in a safe and reliable way. It works as a digital marketplace similar to "Los Corotos," allowing users to sell products they no longer use and acquire second-hand items in their local area. I worked as a full-stack developer at ForTodos, where I was responsible for creating new functionalities and improving the current product.
achievements: Improved the response time of several services in the API, significantly enhancing the overall application response time.
Optimized processes in the app to improve performance on devices with low RAM.
Made significant improvements to real-time events such as chat and notifications, ensuring a better user experience.
Acquired by Yummy Rides in Jan 2025.

jobs.title: Shopify Developer (part-time)
jobs.description: Sweedies crafts indulgent, superfood-infused treats for moments of relaxation and enjoyment. Their products offers accessible indulgence, perfect for post-workout treats or movie nights. Sweedies' dedication to excellence drives me to craft captivating online experiences. As a developer, I create bespoke website themes, aligning with Sweedies' vision of quality and innovation.
achievements: Built an entirely new theme from scratch with a unique design in record time.

jobs.title: Shopify Developer (part-time)
jobs.description: Tonymoly Colombia, a Korean cosmetics leader since 2015, educates Latin women on Eastern-inspired skincare. Offering specialized products, I, as a developer, resolved issues and enhanced the live theme. My attention to detail maintained Tonymoly's online presence, reinforcing its position in Colombia.
achievements: Improved the UI, resulting in a significantly better user experience.
Optimized the website using Lighthouse from Chrome, improving response time and performance scores.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description: ByYuto LLC is a unique design, app, and web development agency that goes beyond mere service provision. They prioritize building enduring partnerships with clients, rooted in transparency, trust, and a mutual commitment to excellence. As a full-stack developer at ByYuto, I contribute to the company's mission by leveraging my expertise in both front-end and back-end development to create innovative solutions for clients.
achievements: Gained knowledge of artificial intelligence while working with a client who already used AI in their processes. I contributed to creating a feature for an automatic response bot, improving customer service efficiency.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Javascript Developer
jobs.description: At Insightt, a top car repossession firm in the USA, I excelled as a developer. I used JavaScript (React.js) for intuitive front-end interfaces and Node.js for robust back-end functionality. Additionally, I developed mobile apps with React Native, expanding their reach and enhancing user accessibility. My expertise drove Insightt's technological advancement, ensuring ongoing success in the industry.
achievements: Significantly improved the geolocation functionality in the app through code enhancements and better data processing, optimizing the user experience in React Native.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Software Developer, CTO and Shopify Developer
jobs.description: Tipzty, an e-commerce solution provider, specializes in boosting sales through live shopping and Personal Shopper assistance. As CTO for three months, I led development decisions, leveraging JavaScript (React.js), GoLang, Node.js, Flutter, and React Native. Spearheaded a Shopify app to sell services, enhancing market presence and facilitating seamless e-commerce integration. Contributed to Tipzty's mission of empowering businesses to thrive digitally through strategic innovation.
achievements: Created a website that enabled sales through live streams.
Developed a Shopify plugin that displayed reviews via videos and streams, improving customer interaction with the product.
Built a React Native app that allowed users to perform streams, enhancing accessibility and functionality.
As CTO, I led the team to deliver the product on time, meeting all requirements and achieving a significant business impact.

jobs.title: Full-Stack JavaScript Developer
jobs.description: At Cobuildlab, a cutting-edge software development company, I improved my skills in JavaScript, including React.js, Node.js, React Native, 8base, and GraphQL. I contributed to various projects, including okroo.com, jobcore.co, and menafesting.com, enriching my experience and expertise in delivering high-quality solutions.
achievements: Had the opportunity to create an app with a unique design from scratch, where I was involved in both development and design, ensuring an excellent user experience.

jobs.title: Front-End Developer
jobs.description: At Picap, an innovative app akin to Uber in LATAM, specializing in motorcycle and car rides, I spearheaded front-end development using React.js. Notably, I undertook the responsibility of crafting a bespoke administrative panel for the company, eschewing templates to ensure tailor-made solutions.
achievements: Taught my colleagues about Git and other technologies, helping improve collaboration and workflow within the team.

jobs.title: React Native Mobile Developer
jobs.description: At Aerolab, a leading software development agency, my role as a mobile developer focused on React Native. I played a significant role in completing an app for www.personal.com.ar, showcasing my expertise in mobile development within the React Native framework.
achievements: Resolved numerous bugs in a banking app, which allowed me to gain valuable knowledge in the fintech field and security-related topics.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
jobs.description: My tenure at Cmantikweb marked my debut as a Full-Stack Developer in a software agency. I adeptly utilized a range of technologies including React.js, Backbone.js, PHP5+ with Laravel, MySQL, OctoberCMS, Node.js, and more. This experience laid a solid foundation for my journey as a versatile developer.
achievements: Successfully migrated a website from WordPress to OctoberCMS, improving performance and usability in many areas.
Gained significant knowledge by creating animations with JavaScript and using the Canvas API to build interactive components.

jobs.title: Back-End Developer
jobs.description: I specialized in developing microservices with Node.js for Valery's web and desktop applications. Valery offers a diverse range of products tailored to optimize and streamline operations across various industries, enhancing business efficiency and management.
achievements: Participated in migrating the company's services to Node.js from Delphi programming language, improving the scalability and efficiency of the services.
